clauses.title: Private messages may be read
clauses.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text:
Messaging
We collect information about your GlobaliD Messenger actions, including who you add or remove from contacts, your chat history, message length, blocked users, and message type, (image or text).
We use your GlobaliD messaging activity to provide the Messenger functionality to our users.

case.text: Private messages can be read

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: but you should note that in many situations we must keep your Personal Data to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, or for another one of our business purposes.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
Context
Personal Data we Collect
How we Use Data Account Registration
We may collect your name, display name, unique description and telephone number when you create a GlobaliD account.

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: Your personal data may be shared or otherwise transferred as part of a merging / acquisition proceeding
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If another company acquires, or plans to acquire, our company, business, or our assets, we will also share information with that company, including at the negotiation stage.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text:
We collect information from your mobile device such as unique identifying information broadcast from your device when visiting our application.
We use this information to understand how users interact with us on their mobile devices to provide tailored Services.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: By submitting your Personal Data to us you agree to the transfer, storage and processing of your information in a country other than your country of residence including, but not necessarily limited to, the United States.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: We provide our users the ability to store Personal Data securely on their devices or through our platform, and share Personal Data only as needed with GlobaliD or third parties

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data but it the service may not comply.
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: Any GlobaliD user may withdraw his or her Consent. however, it will be subject to the applicable laws and regulations, including, but not limited to, data retention requirements.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties
clauses.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We do not share your Personal Data unless either you specifically provide your Consent to do so, or we are under a legal obligation to provide your Personal Data according to applicable laws

case.text: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties

clauses.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).
clauses.clause_text: However, we may do so in order to fulfill obligations imposed by law, in which case we will inform you of any such Processing and provide you with an opportunity to object, as allowable by law.

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making
clauses.description: The service promises not to use your personal data for automated decision-making, including profiling.
clauses.clause_text: <li>We do not use your Personal Data for the purposes of automated decision-making.

case.text: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making

clauses.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online which may be copied by third parties
clauses.clause_text:
hile you may add, edit, and/or delete data you have made public, you acknowledge that once data has been made public, any and every one may have had access to, and made use of, your public data. We, and other third parties, may have made copies and preserved any public data that you have added, edited, and/or deleted.

For Personal Data that you have not designated public:

case.text: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text: We may disclose information in response to subpoenas, warrants, or court orders, or in connection with any legal process, or to comply with relevant laws.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text:
Note that California residents may be entitled to ask us for a notice describing what categories of Personal Data (if any) we share with third parties or affiliates for direct marketing
  • Change Your Personal Data. We rely on you to update and correct your Personal Data. The GlobaliD Site and GlobaliD App allows you to modify or delete your account profile. If it does not permit you to update or correct certain information or delete your account, you may contact us at the address below in order to request that your information be modified.

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text:
If you are not satisfied with our response, and are in the European Union, you may have a right to lodge a complaint with your local supervisory authority.

 

Privacy Policy: Summary

1.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
Security

Our user’s Personal Data is encrypted, anonymized and backed up to the cloud. The key required to decrypt that data is only held by the owner of the name

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You can choose with whom you share content
clauses.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.
clauses.clause_text: We enable privacy through verifications or securely-made claims about the validity of some piece of information about your identity. Verifications associated with your GlobaliD Name are public and viewable to GlobaliD Name holders and partners, but the underlying Personal Data (e.g. date of birth, phone number) is private and is only ever seen by the third party providing the verification, or if you chose to grant an entity or person access to your Personal Data.

case.text: You can choose with whom you share content

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: <em>Last modified: 27 November 2020

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance
clauses.description: When you're not logged in to a service, but use it repeatedly, it may still feel weird that their terms and conditions can change between one use and the next. However, this does not violate the rule-of-thumb that each new version should be accepted from scratch, without inferring your acceptance from the acceptance of an earlier version. Since no acceptance is inferred from continued use, but only from current use, we rate this as neutral instead of bad.
clauses.clause_text:
We may change our Privacy Policy and practices over time.
To the extent that this Policy changes in a material way, the privacy policy that was in place at the time that you submitted Personal Data to us will generally govern that information unless we receive your Consent to the new privacy policy.

case.text: Conditions may change, but your continued acceptance is not inferred from an earlier acceptance

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: Abusive or inappropriate submitted material may be flagged on our platform through community moderation and may be ghosted from public view.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
<li>Our Policy on Children: GlobaliD Services are not directed to children under 13.
To use GiD Services, you must be old enough to consent to the processing of your Personal Information in your jurisdiction.
If we learn that a child under 13 has provided us withPersonal Information, GiD will take immediate steps to delete such information.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text:
Cookies and First Party Tracking
We use cookies and clear GIFs.
“Cookies” are small pieces of information that a website stores locally on your computer’s hard drive while a website is viewed.

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
We may create Anonymous Data from the Personal Data we receive about our users.
We make Personal Data into Anonymous Data by excluding information (such as your first name) that makes the data personally identifiable to you.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: We do not currently recognize automated browser signals regarding tracking mechanisms, which may include “Do Not Track” instructions.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
